abstract: Three big city mayors who took part in a panel discussion Monday night criticized the federal government for not giving them the tools they need to help their cities thrive.
snippet: Three big city mayors who took part in a panel discussion Monday night criticized the federal government for not giving them the tools they need to help their cities thrive.
lead_paragraph: CHICAGO - Three big-city mayors who took part in a panel discussion Monday night criticized the federal government for not giving them the tools they need to help their cities thrive.

headline.main: Mayors Say U.S. Is Ignorant of Cities' Needs
